Scripture Reading All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness; 2 Timothy 3:16
Praying And pray in the Spirit on all occasions with all kinds of prayers and requests. With this in mind, be alert and always keep on praying for all the Lords people; Ephesians 6:18.
Kindness But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness; Galations 5:22.

Use a Google Sign In credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Facebook Login
Use a Facebook Login credential to authenticate with Firebase.
Firebase + Twitter Login

Email/Password Authentication
Use an email and password to authenticate with Firebase.
Anonymous Authentication
Sign in anonymously and then later upgrade to a full Firebase Auth user.
Custom Authentication
Use a custom token signed by your own server to authenticate with Firebase.
FirebaseUI Auth
Use the FirebaseUI-Android library to authenticate with Firebase.
